channel.title: Frontify on The Best Landing Page Inspiration | Lapa.Ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Frontify on The Best Landing Page Inspiration

description.p: Frontify is a software company based somewhere between Switzerlands deepest blue lakes and highest snowy mountains. Their chocolate fueled craftsmen develop web based apps that help you master the entire web design-to-development workflow (Frontify Workspace), collaborate joyfully and create professional brand & design style guides (Frontify Style Guide).
